collectible.title: Sack of Storing
collectible.subtitle: One convienient receptable for all your equipment, tools, and all of the other collectibles you've unlocked
collectible.text:
"You can keep it or whatever. Put stuff in it, if you want. I've already got a +4 version, so I don't need this one."
Its only contents are 50 feet of hempen rope and a blindfold.

collectible.title: Deck of Pok√©mans Cards
collectible.subtitle: Gotta collect all of them!
collectible.text: A premade deck of collectible Pocket Humans cards, such as Sanjeet Chaudhari and Sarah Paulson. Would be very confusing if mixed into a poker deck.
collectible.unlock: See Aaravi level up her poker skill. This can only happen if she's still in the game after 30 total rounds. If you face her in a location where learning is encouraged, you might be able to help her accumulate that experience more quickly.
